rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable EG.EGSPID

modelClassVariable.title: Short Name of Measurement, Test or Examination

priorVersion.title: ECG Test or Examination Short Name

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable EG.EGTESTCD

datasetVariables.description: Short name of the measurement, test, or examination described in EGTEST. It can be used as a column name when converting a dataset from a vertical to a horizontal format. The value in EGTESTCD cannot be longer than 8 characters, nor can it start with a number (e.g., "1TEST" is not valid). EGTESTCD cannot contain characters other than letters, numbers, or underscores. Examples: EGHRMN, QTMAX.
datasetVariables.label: ECG Test Short Name
datasetVariables.name: EGTESTCD

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C71152

modelClassVariable.title: Name of Measurement, Test or Examination

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable EG.EGTEST

datasetVariables.description: Long name for EGTESTCD. The value in EGTEST cannot be longer than 40 characters. Examples: ECG Mean Heart Rate, Summary (Max) QT Duration.
datasetVariables.label: ECG Test Name
datasetVariables.name: EGTEST

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C90012

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable EG.EGCAT

datasetVariables.description: Used to define a category of the ECG test performed. Examples: MEASUREMENT, DIAGNOSIS, INTERPRETATION.

datasetVariables.name: EGCAT

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable EG.EGPOS

datasetVariables.description: Position of the subject during a measurement or examination. If the subject is restrained, populate with the position (example SITTING or STANDING); otherwise, populate with UNCONSTRAINED.
datasetVariables.label: ECG Position of Subject
datasetVariables.name: EGPOS

modelClassVariable.title: Result or Finding in Original Units

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable EG.EGORRES

datasetVariables.description: Result of the ECG measurement or finding as originally received or collected.

datasetVariables.name: EGORRES

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable EG.EGORRESU

datasetVariables.description: The unit for the original result. The unit of the original result should be mapped to a synonymous unit on the Controlled Terminology (http://www.cdisc.org/terminology) list.
datasetVariables.label: Unit of the Original Result
datasetVariables.name: EGORRESU

modelClassVariable.title: Result or Finding in Standard Format

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable EG.EGSTRESC

datasetVariables.description: Contains the result value for all findings, copied or derived from EGORRES, in a standard format or standard units. EGSTRESC should store all results or findings in character format, using controlled terminology, where possible. If results are numeric, they should also be stored in numeric format in EGSTRESN.
datasetVariables.label: Standardized Result in Character Format
datasetVariables.name: EGSTRESC

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable EG.EGSTRESN

datasetVariables.description: Used for numeric results or findings in standard format; contains the numeric form of EGSTRESC. EGSTRESN should store all numeric test results or findings.
datasetVariables.label: Standardized Result in Numeric Format
datasetVariables.name: EGSTRESN

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C71620

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable EG.EGSTRESU

datasetVariables.description: Standardized unit used for EGSTRESC and EGSTRESN.
datasetVariables.label: Unit of the Standardized Result
datasetVariables.name: EGSTRESU

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable EG.EGXFN

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable EG.EGBLFL

datasetVariables.description: A baseline indicator may be used to calculate differences or changes from baseline. Value should be Y or null. The baseline flag is sponsor defined.
datasetVariables.label: Baseline Flag
datasetVariables.name: EGBLFL

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C66742

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable EG.EGDRVFL

datasetVariables.description: Used to indicate a derived record. The value should be Y or null. Records that represent the average of other records, or that are not as originally received or collected, are examples of records that might be derived for the submission datasets.
datasetVariables.label: Derived Flag
datasetVariables.name: EGDRVFL

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable EG.EGEVAL

datasetVariables.description: Role of the person who provided the evaluation. Should be null for records that contain collected or derived data. Examples: RESPONSIBLE SCIENTIST, PRINCIPAL INVESTIGATOR, PEER REVIEWER.
datasetVariables.label: Evaluator
datasetVariables.name: EGEVAL

datasetVariables.name: EGEXCLFL

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable EG.EGREASEX

datasetVariables.label: Reason for Exclusion
datasetVariables.name: EGREASEX

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C66742

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable EG.EGUSCHFL

datasetVariables.description: Indicates whether the timing of the performed test or observation was unscheduled. If a test or observation was performed based upon a schedule defined in the protocol, this flag should be null. Expected values are Y or null.
datasetVariables.label: Unscheduled Flag
datasetVariables.name: EGUSCHFL

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable EG.VISITDY

datasetVariables.description: Planned study day of collection. Should be an integer.

datasetVariables.name: VISITDY

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable EG.EGDTC

datasetVariables.description: Date/Time of ECG data collection, in ISO 8601 format. For indicating measurement over a continuous period, DTC should be used to indicate start date/time of collection.
datasetVariables.label: Date/Time of ECG Collection
datasetVariables.name: EGDTC

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable EG.EGENDTC

datasetVariables.description: Date/Time of end of the ECG data collection, in ISO 8601 format. Should be populated for measurement over a continuous period only.
datasetVariables.label: End Date/Time of ECG Collection
datasetVariables.name: EGENDTC

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable EG.EGDY

datasetVariables.description: Study day of the ECG measurement collection, in integer days. The algorithm for calculations must be relative to the sponsor-defined RFSTDTC variable in the Demographics (DM) domain.

datasetVariables.name: EGDY

self.title: Study Day of End of ECG Collection

datasetVariables.description: Study day of the end of the ECG measurement collection, in integer days. The algorithm for calculations must be relative to the sponsor-defined RFSTDTC variable in the Demographics (DM) domain.
datasetVariables.label: Study Day of End of ECG Collection
datasetVariables.name: EGENDY

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable EG.EGNOMDY

datasetVariables.description: Nominal study day used for grouping records for observations that may occur on different days into a single reported study day. Should be an integer.
datasetVariables.label: Nominal Study Day for Tabulations
datasetVariables.name: EGNOMDY

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable EG.EGNOMLBL

datasetVariables.description: A label for a given value of EGNOMDY as presented in the study report. Examples: Pre-Treatment, Week 4, Day 28.
datasetVariables.label: Label for Nominal Study Day
datasetVariables.name: EGNOMLBL

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable EG.EGTPT

datasetVariables.description: Text description of time when ECG data should be collected. Note: This may be represented as an elapsed time relative to a fixed reference point, such as time of last dose. See EGTPTNUM and EGTPTREF. Examples: Predose, 1 Hour Postdose.
datasetVariables.label: Planned Time Point Name
datasetVariables.name: EGTPT

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable EG.EGTPTNUM

datasetVariables.description: Numerical version of EGTPT to aid in sorting.
datasetVariables.label: Planned Time Point Number
datasetVariables.name: EGTPTNUM

modelClassVariable.title: Planned Elapsed Time from Time Point Ref

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1 (Final)

priorVersion.title: Planned Elapsed Time from Time Point Ref

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable EG.EGELTM

self.title: Planned Elapsed Time from Time Point Ref

datasetVariables.description: Planned elapsed time (in ISO 8601 format) relative to a fixed time point reference (EGTPTREF). This variable is useful where there are repetitive measures. Not a clock-time or a date-time variable. Represented as an ISO 8601 duration. Examples: "-PT15M" to represent the period of 15 minutes prior to the reference point indicated by EGTPTREF, or "PT8H" to represent the period of 8 hours after the reference point indicated by EGTPTREF.
datasetVariables.label: Planned Elapsed Time from Time Point Ref
datasetVariables.name: EGELTM

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable EG.EGTPTREF

datasetVariables.description: Name of the fixed reference point referred to by EGELTM, if used for EGTPTNUM, and EGTPT. It is recommended that EGTPTREF be as descriptive as possible so the reference time point can be inferred without looking at others variables. Example: DAY 1 FIRST DOSE.
datasetVariables.label: Time Point Reference
datasetVariables.name: EGTPTREF

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable EG.EGRFTDTC

datasetVariables.description: Date/Time of the reference time point, EGTPTREF.
datasetVariables.label: Date/Time of Reference Time Point
datasetVariables.name: EGRFTDTC

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable EG.EGEVLINT

datasetVariables.description: Length of evaluation interval in ISO 8601 duration format. Used in place of EGSTINT and EGENINT when EGTPTREF is not available.
datasetVariables.label: Evaluation Interval
datasetVariables.name: EGEVLINT

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable EG.EGSTINT

datasetVariables.description: Planned Start of an asessment interval relative to Time Point Reference (EGTPTREF) in ISO 8601 duration format.
datasetVariables.label: Planned Start of Assessment Interval
datasetVariables.name: EGSTINT

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable EG.EGENINT

datasetVariables.description: Planned End of an assessment interval relative to Time Point Reference (EGTPTREF) in ISO 8601 duration format.
datasetVariables.label: Planned End of Assessment Interval
datasetVariables.name: EGENINT

description: A findings domain that contains ECG data, including position of the subject, method of evaluation, all cycle measurements and all findings from the ECG including an overall interpretation if collected or derived. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, SDOMAIN, C49626, 2018-06-29)
label: ECG
name: EG
